QuestData.Title: Runestones of Binding
QuestData.Description: ON THE OTHER... SIDE OF... MY CHAMBER THERE... ARE... CANDIDATES FOR ASCENSION.$B$BWE WILL NEED... THEIR... RUNESTONES OF BINDING... TO CREATE A... MEANS OF CONTROLLING... A BOUND ELEMENTAL.
QuestData.CompletionText: DO... YOU HAVE... ALL THAT IS... REQUIRED?
QuestData.RewardText: WE WILL USE... THESE... RUNESTONES TO ALLOW... YOU TO POSSESS... ONE OF... THE WATER ELEMENTALS.
